channel.title: AncientBlitz | Dwarf Multi Cannon | 10+ Minigames | 15+ Bosses | Construction
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://ancientblitz-rsps.com/forums/images/dragonbyte_mmogaming/misc/ablogo4.png[/img] AncientBlitz has been around for over three years, we have recently updated to a new server, loading higher graphics, and it has 24 working skills. It is newly released as of June 5th, 2013. We hope you check it out, and have a great time!
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/1498569.png[/img]Website: [url=http://www.ancientblitz.com/home]AncientBlitz - A New Beginning[/url] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/28t9y0w.png[/img]Play Now: [url=http://www.ancientblitz.com/home/webclient.html]AncientBlitz - A New Beginning[/url] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2h3zjae.png[/img]Download: [url=http://www.ancientblitz.com/AncientBlitz.jar]AncientBlitz - A New Beginning[/url] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2h3zjae.png[/img]HiScores: [url=http://www.ancientblitz.com/hiscores]AncientBlitz - A New Beginning[/url][/CENTER]
[center][size=18pt][font=Verdana]Features[/font][/size][/center]
[center]- No lag, 24-7. - Stable economy. - Fully Working dwarf multicannon - Perfectly working Hunter - Perfect combat - Revenants - 15+ bosses including Nex, Corporal beast, tormented demons and many others. - Two custom quests. - Full farming - Clan system with complete management(promoting, demoting, kicking, banning etc...) - Dungeoneering with mutliple floors - Summoning with all familiars - Newest/old hit marks - Glacors + Steadfast, Gaiven and Ragefire boots - Full pest control - Full Castle Wars - Full duel arena - Abysall whip vine - Bh pk system - Killstreak system - Hiscores - Perfect Ancient Curses. - Perfect korasi sword. - Slayer helm fully working - Completionist cape and Tokhaar-Kal cape - Overloads, prayer renewals, recover special potion and more. - All special attacks from ags to Dragon Pickaxe fully working. - Working renewal, augury & rigour & ring of vigour prayers - All npcs have a good variety of drops. - Woodcutting trees & mining ores respawn. - Advanced teleporting system with jewellery. - Vote4Reward - Active Community with professional forums. - Regular double exp/drops weekend. - Fully working abyss plus runecrafting pouches. - Enourmous variety of places where you can train skills & combat. - Perfect Switching. - Website based account management system - Regular community events & drop parties. - Bank pins[/center]
[center][size=18pt]Pictures:[/size][/center]
[center][size=16pt]Login Screen:[/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/KvzsYIO.png[/img]
[size=16pt]Loyalty Point's with shop:[/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mT2lCO5.png[/img]
[size=16pt]Money pouch 100% working:[/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bfkoiPm.png[/img]
[size=16pt]Over 10 flawless minigames![/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zy3e9FC.png[/img]
[size=16pt]Every skill works! Including dungeoneering and construction![/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bhJZ5M9.png[/img]
[size=16pt]Agility store![/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bxigBmH.png[/img]
[size=16pt]Staff online![/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TSNxnir.png[/img]
[size=16pt]Construction[/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OQaIYKb.png[/img]
[size=16pt]Bank Tabs[/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/K0DfY9x.png[/img]
[size=16pt]Clue Scrolls[/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bxHSI6Q.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/q2EC9oY.png[/img]
[size=16pt]Achievements[/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DghGLAK.png[/img]
[size=16pt]Inferno Adze burns log[/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jqQayoG.png[/img]
[size=16pt]Birds Nests[/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uXqKSJ6.png[/img]
[size=16pt]All milestone capes, including vet cape[/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nE1S7ik.png[/img]
[size=16pt]100% Firemaking including bonfires[/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8JIITGq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AGpr8Ue.png[/img]
[size=16pt]Hunter[/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2FIUQQ5.png[/img]
[size=16pt]Achievements, over 50 tasks to complete[/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NnHCQGn.png[/img]
[size=16pt]Summoning[/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iwDBBAR.png[/img]
[size=16pt] Corp[/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/F8QnwLd.png[/img]
[size=16pt]Nex[/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/EE7bs9p.png[/img]
[size=16pt]Torms[/size] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/U5K8UQN.png[/img]
[size=16pt]Dominion Tower[/size]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/djrqHGr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Jcfsexb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uextI6C.png[/img]
[size=16pt]Dwarf Multi Cannon:[/size] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VforlesYjJ8
[size=16pt]Construction:[/size] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RzoOZ4zAgb0[/center]
[CENTER][IMG]http://ancientblitz-rsps.com/forums/images/dragonbyte_mmogaming/misc/ablogo4.png[/img] AncientBlitz has been around for over three years, we have recently updated to a new server, loading higher graphics, and it has 24 working skills. It is newly released as of June 5th, 2013. We hope you check it out, and have a great time!
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/1498569.png[/img]Website: [url=http://www.ancientblitz.com/home]AncientBlitz - A New Beginning[/url] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/28t9y0w.png[/img]Play Now: [url=http://www.ancientblitz.com/home/webclient.html]AncientBlitz - A New Beginning[/url] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2h3zjae.png[/img]Download: [url=http://www.ancientblitz.com/AncientBlitz.jar]AncientBlitz - A New Beginning[/url] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2h3zjae.png[/img]HiScores: [url=http://www.ancientblitz.com/hiscores]AncientBlitz - A New Beginning[/url][/CENTER]

item.title: AncientBlitz | Dwarf Multi Cannon | 10+ Minigames | 15+ Bosses | Construction
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:15, topic:520088”][quote author=kill you704 link=topic=638582.msg4310796#msg4310796 date=1370713756]

What’s your average playercount?

We have only been up three days now, the first day was 20-25, and after I added a logout timer of two minutes, to prevent people farming loyalty points, we average 15-25.
[/quote]
Alright, thanks for honesty Your play now should link to this: http://www.ancientblitz-rsps.com/home/webclient.html by the way[/quote]
Don’t want to lie and waste your time by you downloading cache, logging in and noticing its not what I said. And there could of been a benefit, some people like small servers.

Read full topic

item.title: AncientBlitz | Dwarf Multi Cannon | 10+ Minigames | 15+ Bosses | Construction
item.dc:creator: @kill_you704 kill you704
item.description:
@kill_you704 wrote:

[CENTER]
AncientBlitz has been around for over three years, we have recently updated to a new server, loading higher graphics, and it has 24 working skills. It is newly released as of June 5th, 2013. We hope you check it out, and have a great time!

Website: AncientBlitz - A New Beginning
Play Now: AncientBlitz - A New Beginning
Download: AncientBlitz - A New Beginning
HiScores: AncientBlitz - A New Beginning[/CENTER]

[center][size=18pt][font=Verdana]Features[/font][/size][/center]

[center]- No lag, 24-7.

  • Stable economy.
  • Fully Working dwarf multicannon
  • Perfectly working Hunter
  • Perfect combat
  • Revenants
  • 15+ bosses including Nex, Corporal beast, tormented demons and many others.
  • Two custom quests.
  • Full farming
  • Clan system with complete management(promoting, demoting, kicking, banning etc…)
  • Dungeoneering with mutliple floors
  • Summoning with all familiars
  • Newest/old hit marks
  • Glacors + Steadfast, Gaiven and Ragefire boots
  • Full pest control
  • Full Castle Wars
  • Full duel arena
  • Abysall whip vine
  • Bh pk system
  • Killstreak system
  • Hiscores
  • Perfect Ancient Curses.
  • Perfect korasi sword.
  • Slayer helm fully working
  • Completionist cape and Tokhaar-Kal cape
  • Overloads, prayer renewals, recover special potion and more.
  • All special attacks from ags to Dragon Pickaxe fully working.
  • Working renewal, augury & rigour & ring of vigour prayers
  • All npcs have a good variety of drops.
  • Woodcutting trees & mining ores respawn.
  • Advanced teleporting system with jewellery.
  • Vote4Reward
  • Active Community with professional forums.
  • Regular double exp/drops weekend.
  • Fully working abyss plus runecrafting pouches.
  • Enourmous variety of places where you can train skills & combat.
  • Perfect Switching.
  • Website based account management system
  • Regular community events & drop parties.
  • Bank pins[/center]
